com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.world

Class WorldHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.world.WorldHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, javax.inject.Provider<WorldConfig>

    @Singleton
public class WorldHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler, com.google.inject.Provider<WorldConfig>
    Handles the worlds (loading, unloading etc)

      • loadWorld

        @Nonnull
public org.bukkit.World loadWorld(@Nonnull
                                           Map map,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           java.util.UUID gameid,
                                           boolean replaceMarkers)
        Loads a world. Needs to copy the file from the repo, unzip it and let the implementation load it
        Always needs to call super! Super needs to be called first (because it copies the world)
        Parameters:
        map - the map that should be loaded
        gameid - the id of the game this map belongs to
        Returns:
        the loaded world
        Throws:
        WorldException - something goes wrong

      • unloadWorld

        public void unloadWorld(@Nonnull
                        Map map,
                        @Nonnull
                        java.util.UUID gameid)
        Unloads a world. Needs to lets the implementation unload the world and delete the folder
        Always needs to call super! Super needs to be called last (because it deletes the world folder)
        Parameters:
        map - the map that should be unloaded.
        gameid - the id of the game that this map belongs to

        Parameters:
